relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.heent: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops or rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, nontender, no rebound or guarding.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused.

relevant_findings.ultrasound: Phlegmonous collection in the right lower quadrant measuring approximately 6.1 x 3.6 cm. Not organized enough for catheter drainage.
